description:
剑3篇

剑3出版时间较早，因此出题点较现在来看有些不太一样，尤其是现在盗版碟中的录音，语速尤其快，这是由于剑3正版只有磁带的缘故。在题目上剑3的难度并不大。

其中test 4 section 3是较难的一篇。这篇是讨论学生所写论文的修改。题型是选择+搭配+填空题。第一个难点出现在第3题。

23 Amina was surprised because she

A thought it was bad.

B wrote it quickly.

C found it difficult to do.

此题和上一题距离非常近，在做题时极容易由于还在思考上一题的答案而忽略此题的答案。其次此题的文字答案是That's amazing because I really didn't find it a bit easy to write...这边surprise和amaze的同意互换相当有难度。而选项B wrote it quickly中的wrote，非常容易成为干扰选项。

Questions 24-26

What suggestions does Dr Bryson make? Complete the table as follows.

Write A if he says KEEP UNCHANGED

Write B if he says REWRITE

Write C if he says REMOVE COMPLETELY

Chronology 26  .................

文字答案：

AMINA:  What about the chronology ... the list of dates? I wasn’t sure whether I should rewrite those.

BRYSON:  My advice on that is to take them out. I feel it makes the whole piece appear too simplistic.

这边学生询问是不是应该rewrite，而教授的观点是应该take out，因此应该选C，但是很容易受到前面的rewrite影响而错选择了B。

Read 27 '................' by Kate Oakwell.

Make changes and show to 28 ................ .

Do 29 ................ by 29 June.

文字答案：

BRYSON:  And then I think you need to think about ways of representing interview data. Have a look at Sight and Sound by Kate Oakwell.

AMINA:  Sight and Sound.

BRYSON:  Then you know I’m going away on holiday next week . . .

AMINA:  Yes.

BRYSON:  So when you’ve made the changes I suggest you show the work to your Support Tutor.

AMINA:  Support Tutor . . . right. . .

BRYSON:  Then you do the proof reading . . .

AMINA:  Proof reading . . . uh-huh. When by, do you think?

27题的答案是sight and sound，极容易写成site或cite，读音一致但是意思差很远。28和29题词汇有一定难度，尤其是28题不可以漏写Support，这些会带来不少麻烦。

总体来说正版剑3语速并不快，考点也比较清晰。但是会出现个别难度较高的词汇，需要重点注意。

description:
火车票实名制

Name-based train ticket system can help protect citizens' right to take trains and avoid inequality inselling train tickets currently. The railway is a public resource. Name-based train ticket system has standardized tickets selling and checking procedure, which guarantees equal distribution of ticket resource and can help protect passengers' rights. To some extent, the name-based system suppresses ticket scalpers and partly solves the difficulty of buying a train ticket. The name-based system is originally aimed at solving the problem of being hard to buy train tickets, thus sending train tickets to the needed. So to speak，by making ticket resource more sufficient, the name-based train ticket system further safe guards passengers' rights.

参考翻译

火车票实名制(name-based train ticket system)有利于维护公民乘坐火车的权利，改变当前火车票售卖过程中的不公平现象。铁路系统是公共资源，火车票实名制规范售票、检票程序，使资源得到公平分配，有利于维护乘客利益。实名制在一定程度上遏制了票贩子(ticket scalper)，缓解了购票难的问题。火车票实名制的初衷就是要解决买票难的问题，使火车票到达真正需要的人手里。可以说，火车票实名制使车票资源更加丰富，进一步保障了旅客的权益。

1、“有利于”用“help+动词原形”即可表达出“对……起促进、帮助作用”的意思。一般情况下，“有利于”还可译为benefit，in one's favor或be beneficial to。

2、“遏制票贩子”此处指“打击不法分子的倒卖车票的行径”，故“遏制”可译为suppress或curb。

3、“缓解购票难问题”可理解为“部分解决了购票难的问题”，故译partly solves the difficulty of buying a train ticket。

4、“初衷”可译为be originally aimed at。进行词性转化利于行文。
